main_definition: A regularly distributed periodical publication containing news, features about specific subjects, or other information, usually sent by mail to a group of subscribers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Periodical publications with articles on various topics
meanings_and_examples.example: I subscribe to the 'Tech Innovations' newsletter every month for updates on new gadgets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Marketing communication tool used by businesses to inform customers about products and services
meanings_and_examples.example: The local bakery sends out a weekly newsletter with special offers, recipes, and events.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A way for organizations or clubs to keep their members informed
meanings_and_examples.example: My gardening club distributes a monthly newsletter that includes tips on plant care and upcoming meetings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Electronic newsletters delivered via email as part of an online community or forum
meanings_and_examples.example: I joined the 'Fitness Enthusiasts' forum and receive a daily email digest with workout routines and health advice.
